name: Action Hollywood Remake
description:
This is a student project which demonstrates how an old arcade game can be remade and implemented on mobile. Original Copyright goes to the developers of Action Hollywood. Details: Action Hollywood is a Maze game developed by TCH in 1995 for the Arcade.

This can be played single player or local co-op. Controls for keyboard is on the controls page. Controls for controllers is A (xbox) X (playstation) for attack/spawn and B (xbox) Square (playstation) for run and Left Joystick for movement.

It can also be played on an android: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.ShaunJadeJenee.ActionHollywood...

Highscores are in the game but only working through executed files or the android version.

Created by: 

  • Shaun Cope (me)
  • Jenee Willis
  • Jade Garvan
